articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Joint Performance by Artistes of DPRK and Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Joint Performance by Artistes of DPRK and Russia 
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed together with women officials a joint performance given by artistes of the Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe of the DPRK and the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia, at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Monday on the occasion of the International Women's Day.
					 Kim Jong Il was greeted at the theatre by Pavel Borisovich Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the "Orchestra of the 21st Century" of Russia, Nataliya Semyonova, administrative manager of the orchestra, and Valery Sukhinin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK. 
					
					 He warmly welcomed the Russian orchestra's visit to the DPRK and had a cordial talk with the guests. 
					
					 When he appeared in the auditorium of the theatre, the audience enthusiastically welcomed him, extending highest glory and warmest thanks to him, representing the deepest reverence of all the Korean women for Kim Jong Il who has ushered in the greatest heyday of the Korean women's movement, brought up the Korean women as genuine mistresses of the revolution and construction and provided them with a worthwhile life and happiness.  
					
					 He warmly congratulated the women officials on the International Women's Day and extended a warm salute to all the women of the DPRK performing shining feats to go down in the history of the country by fully displaying the revolutionary stamina of the Korean women on all fronts for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials Kim Jong Un, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Hong Sok Hyong, Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk, Kim Rak Hui and women members and alternate members of the Central Committee of the WPK in Pyongyang, women deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the C.C., the Democratic Women's Union of Korea, and other officials of the union, women labor innovators of factories and enterprises here and women writers, journalists, newscasters, creators and artistes. 
					
					 Also among the audience were the Russian ambassador and his wife and official diplomats of the Russian embassy here. 
					
					 Their colorful performance included mixed chorus "Song in Praise of Women in Songun Era," female sextet and chorus "Women Are Flowers," male solo "My Mother," music "Tondollari," male solo and pangchang "My Wife," mixed duet "Lily Bell" and mixed octet "Toast", songs of Soviet Union, and mixed quartet "I live for You," Italian song. 
					
					 The performance staged by People's Artistes, Merited Artistes, international concours winners and other famous conductors, instrumentalists and vocalists was acclaimed by the audience for their high artistry and excellent representation.
					
					 As the performance was over, they broke into enthusiastic cheers.
					
					 Kim Jong Il acknowledged the rousing cheers of the performers and audience and congratulated the artistes on their successful performance.
					
					 He met leading members of the Russian orchestra after the performance and expressed deep thanks to them for staging a splendid joint performance, pleasing and encouraging the women of the DPRK significantly marking the International Women's Day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Greetings to Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Monday sent a message of greetings to Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					 The message says:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you, Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party and your friendly government and people on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I reiterate the firm support and solidarity of the Korean People with the Syrian people in their struggle to retake the occupied Arab territories including Golan Heights and achieve a fair and comprehensive settlement of the Mideast issue and, at the same time, sincerely wish you good health and happiness as well as fresh success in your work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Syrian President
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria, on the occasion of the 48th anniversary of the March 8 revolution in Syria.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to grow stronger. He also wished him good health and happiness and greater success in the work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: DPRK RC Proposes Urgent Talks over Repatriation of Inhabitants
articles.content:
DPRK RC Proposes Urgent Talks over Repatriation of Inhabitants
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the C. C., the Red Cross Society of the DPRK Monday sent a notice to the president of the south Korean Red Cross proposing to have an urgent north-south Red Cross working contact to discuss the issue of sending back the DPRK inhabitants and a ship now in custody in south Korea.
					 The notice expressed deep regret at the south Korean authorities for their intention to keep four out of the 31 inhabitants under the pretext of false "defection" despite the repeated demand of the DPRK side. It said:
					
					 The south side's outrageous inhuman action is touching off anger among the people of the DPRK. The public at home and abroad is closely following how it will handle this case, concerned about the impact it will have on the north-south relations.
					
					 As for those four persons whom the south Korean authorities claim expressed their intention to "defect" to the south, they have no ground whatsoever to do so in light of their socio-political circumstances and family background. Their families, relatives and colleagues absolutely vouch for them. 
					
					 It suggested to have the contact at the conference room of the former Neutral Nations Supervisory Commission at Panmunjom at 10:00 a.m. on March 9 to accurately confirm the issue of "defection" and realize the early repatriation of all of those in custody.
					
					 Three officials concerned including a member of the C.C., the Red Cross Society of the DPRK as well as family members of those four persons will go to the working contact to make face-to-face confirmation, the notice said. It asked those related to the Red Cross of the south side to bring those four persons concerned to the working contact.

articles.title: Women of Chinese Embassy Visit Various Places of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Women of Chinese Embassy Visit Various Places of Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Women of the Chinese embassy here visited the Pyongyang Hosiery Factory on Monday on the occasion of the March 8 International Women's Day.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the factory has sprung up as a hosiery producer furnished with cutting-edge equipment, they went round various production processes.
					
					Then, they visited the Changgwang Kindergarten.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Germany Diplomatic Ties Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Germany Diplomatic Ties Marked
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Germany hosted a party on March 1 to mark the 10th anniversary of the establishment of the DPRK-Germany diplomatic ties. 
					 Present there on invitation were the state secretary of the Ministry of Finance, the chairman of the preparatory committee for 2011 Women's World Cup, members of Bundestag (Federal Assembly), an official of the Foreign Ministry and other personages of different social standings of Germany. 
					
					 The DPRK ambassador and his embassy officials were on hand. 
					
					 Speeches were made at the party.

articles.title: National Meeting of Commercial Officials Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Commercial Officials Held
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of commercial officials took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 The meeting reviewed the gains and experience made in the past commercial service and discussed tasks and ways for improving this work.
					
					 Present there were Premier Choe Yong Rim, Minister of Light Industry An Jong Su, Minister of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry Jo Yong Chol, Chairman of the State Price Commission Ryang Ui Gyong, President of the Central Bank Paek Ryong Chon and other officials.
					
					 Minister of Commerce Kim Pong Chol made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that leader Kim Jong Il has devoted himself to the people's welfare, visiting a great many units of commercial service.
					
					 His energetic leadership and loving care have served as the source of making the commercial officials fulfill their mission as servants of the people, they added.
					
					 They also referred to the successes achieved in the work for improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 They called on all the participants to bring about a fresh turn in the commercial service and thus contribute to improving the people's standard of living and building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Tourism Diversified In Pyongyang
articles.content:
Tourism Diversified In Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Tourism has been diversified in Pyongyang with many edifices built in the city.
					 Jo Song Gol, a vice-director of the State General Bureau of Tourism, told KCNA that Pyongyang has two main things in the large to enjoy -- spots of beauty and historical interest and the appearance of the city renewed since the latter half of the 1950s.
					
					 In recent years a lot of economic and cultural establishments have been constructed with the e-library and swimming complex of Kim Il Sung University, Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory, Kaeson Youth Park, Ostrich Farm and Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm included.
					
					 They have drawn many foreign tourists.
					
					 The city has many other tourist attractions like Okryu Restaurant, Mt. Ryongak, Mt. Taesong and Moran Hill. 
					
					 Performances of the Unhasu Orchestra, Samjiyon Band of Mansudae Art Troupe, Phibada Opera Troupe and other troupes have also been appreciated by many tourists.

articles.title: New Dam Building Method Developed
articles.content:
New Dam Building Method Developed 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The construction of the Huichon Power Station in the northern part of the DPRK is progressing apace by dint of new construction methods.
					 One of them is a method of prefab dam building.
					
					 Non-reinforced prefabricated concrete parts of different shapes have been made for the dam project.
					
					 This method makes it possible to build the dam at a high speed and in a simple way and ensure continuous concrete tamping, with less materials and manpower.

articles.title: Koryo Medicine Efficacious for Intractable Diseases
articles.content:
Koryo Medicine Efficacious for Intractable Diseases
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on Koryo medicine was held some days ago to mark the 50th anniversary of the Academy of Koryo Medicine.
					 Highlighted at the seminar were methods of applying acupuncture and compound Koryo medicines to intractable diseases.
					
					 In recent years, the country opened up a new phase of modern medical science by renewing the theory of Koryo medicine.
					
					 The efficiency of acupuncture and moxibustion has been proved and new methods of Koryo medical treatment developed.  
					
					 They are applied to such intractable diseases as arrhythmia, angine pectoris, hypertension, thrombopenia, allergic dermatitis and eyesight disorder.
					
					 Besides, methods for treating spontaneous gangrene, early-stage cataract and spontaneous bradyacusia have also been established theoretically.

articles.title: Waist Traction Treatment Apparatus
articles.content:
Waist Traction Treatment Apparatus
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Municipal People's Hospital No. 2 has made a waist traction treatment apparatus.
					 The apparatus makes it possible to improve the treatment of lumbago, including slipped disk.
					
					 The computer-controlled apparatus consists of articulated traction treatment table, traction and angle sensors and actuator.
					
					 Angle, traction power and treatment time are controlled by computer. The parameter also can be adjusted to suit for patient's conditions.
					
					 After undertaking the treatment by the apparatus, the patient scarcely feels pain in the waist.
					
					 The recovery time is considerably faster than other methods.
					
					 The apparatus is enjoying popularity among medical experts.

articles.title: Scorched-rice Tea
articles.content:
Scorched-rice Tea
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Scorched-rice tea is one of the Korean people's traditional drinks.
					 "Rimwonsipryukji", a book written in the early 19th century, gives a detailed explanation of the tasty and nutritive tea.
					
					 The tea is easily prepared at home during rice cooking.
					
					 When rice is well-done, the rice cooker is taken away from fire to steam the boiled rice and heat is applied to the cooker again to get brown scorched part of boiled rice. And volatile substances soak into the rice bit by bit to take a nice taste.
					
					 Water is poured into the cooker with only scorched rice remaining and the cooker is heated again to make the tea ready.
					
					 It is a long-standing table manner of the Korean people to offer the tea after meal.

articles.title: Pulyong Temple
articles.content:
Pulyong Temple
						
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Mt. Myohyang, one of the famous mountains of Korea, has many cultural heritages showing the nation's history and culture and the Korean people's wisdom and talent.
					 Among them is the Pulyong temple built in harmony with the natural scenery.
					
					 The small Buddhist temple, belonging to the Pohyon Temple, was rebuilt in 1700.
					
					 The building with a crane-shaped roof has no pillars in the front but a Korean-style verandah. 
					
					 It is said that people enjoyed the moon on the verandah.

articles.title: Bronze Sculpture "Ancient Nigerian Queen"
articles.content:
Bronze Sculpture "Ancient Nigerian Queen"
						

					
						 
					Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Bronze sculpture "Ancient Nigerian Queen" is on show at the International Friendship Exhibition House in the DPRK. It is a gift General Secretary Kim Jong Il received from Sani Abacha, head of State and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria, in August Juche 86 (1997).
					The sculpture portrays the face of an ancient Nigerian queen putting on high-cut and pointed crown.
					
					The crown with national patterns carved in relief has decorative rings in upper parts of the ears.
					
					It is a custom of Nigeria to present such queen sculpture to a great man.

articles.title: Lovely Women Called Yeppuni in Korea
articles.content:
Lovely Women Called Yeppuni in Korea
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Lovely women who did good things for the country and the people are called Yeppuni in the DPRK.
					 The song "Yeppuni" about a girl nurse who dashed to an enemy tank with a grenade in her hand during the Fatherland Liberation War is popular among the people.
					
					 The women who devoted their lives to the country in both the front and rear during the war are all called Yeppuni.
					
					 Many women have become Yeppunis in the era of the Songun (military-first) politics.
					
					 They include female soldiers, servicemen's wives and disabled soldiers' wives, as well as those distinguishing themselves in the effort for the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 Also included in them are famous educationists, scientific researchers, artistes and sportswomen.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Joint Military Exercises Harassing Dialogue and Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Joint Military Exercises Harassing Dialogue and Peace
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities kicked off the joint military exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, together with the U.S. This is a grave provocation spoiling the atmosphere of dialogue and improved north-south relations. Rodong Sinmun says this in a bylined article Monday.
					 The U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces are describing the saber-rattling as one for "preventing provocations" and "defending themselves" but it is shameless sophism to conceal their true colors as aggressors, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are entirely aimed at invading the DPRK in light of their nature and contents.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the drills are being staged at a time when the situation on the Korean Peninsula is at the crossroads of dialogue and confrontation.
					
					  What the U.S. is after is to realize its ambition for dominating the DPRK, not peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula. In order to put into practice this criminal goal, the U.S. is set not to rule out even a nuclear war against the Korean nation. The south Korean ruling quarters, however, are staging war maneuvers against fellow countrymen in collusion with the U.S. according to their vicious scenarios to realize the ambition to invade the north at any cost, clean indifferent to the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The war maneuvers in south Korea will make it impossible to preserve peace on the Korean Peninsula and achieve its peaceful reunification. The historic lesson teaches that the war maneuvers against the other party will bring distrust, confrontation, increased tensions and military clashes, which will lead to a war disaster in the long run.

articles.title: S. Korean Minister of Unification's Call for "Change of Attitude" Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Minister of Unification's Call for "Change of Attitude" Blasted
						
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- South Korean Minister of Unification Hyon In Thaek in "an address" made at a recent "commemorative meeting" let loose a whole string of nonsense that south Korea has pursued "a principled policy toward the north" based on "no-nukes, opening and 3000 dollars" over the past three years and this would "become a landmark turn in unification" in the future. He went the lengths of blustering that the ministry "should force the north to make changes, steering history", crying out for "a radical change in its attitude", "denuclearization" and "its opening to outside world."
					 His outbursts come under fire by a by-lined commentary of Rodong Sinmun Monday. 
					
					In a word, his reckless remarks betray his sinister intention to do harm to the DPRK by putting into practice "no-nukes, opening and 3000 dollars", the anti-reunification policy for confrontation, at any cost, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 As for Hyon, he is the arch criminal who brought the present inter-Korean relations to catastrophe as he shaped the confrontation policy of the south Korean conservative authorities and is its executor.
					
					 Such rhetoric could be let loose only by Hyon who views even confrontation and war as peace and reunification, obsessed with extreme antagonism and ambition for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					  By "the radical change in the attitude" he meant a very sinister scenario to disarm the DPRK and lead it to opening through the moves to escalate confrontation with the DPRK including nuclear and human rights rackets in a bid to realize his wild ambition for "achieving unification of systems." This is little short of declaring that Hyon would continue rushing headlong into confrontation with fellow countrymen and the moves to ignite a war against the DPRK, categorically rejecting the ideology and system in it and the improvement of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					 Hyon is an unpardonable anti-reunification element totally going against the aspiration of the nation as he is still vociferating about "principle", not content with having kept the inter-Korean relations in the mire of catastrophe for three years.
					
					 Hyon will never be able to shake off an ill-fame as an anti-reunification element.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Accused of Its Crackdown upon Innocent People
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Accused of Its Crackdown upon Innocent People
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The representative of the south Korean Democratic Labor Party accused the police of incriminating innocent people by invoking the "National Security Law" under the patronage of the present "government". 
					 The number of those who were booked for violations of the NSL by the police from 2008 to late in last year increased more than 2.5 times as compared with that in the period of its predecessor while that of those prosecuted for offenses dropped by half, he noted,  adding: 
					
					 This is because the police are indiscriminately invoking the NSL in a bid to "arrest as many people as possible," prompted by their ambition to attain big results as their work is estimated by the number of the arrested and detained under the present "government".

articles.title: Exemption from Military Service Rife among Officials in S. Korea
articles.content:
Exemption from Military Service Rife among Officials in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The exemption from military service is rife among high-ranking officials of the present "government" in south Korea.
					 It was disclosed that the rate of exemption from military service among them is 24.1 percent or ten times that among ordinary people.
					
					 The highest rate of exemption from military service was among officials of the Fair Trade Commission under the direct control of the "prime minister," in particular, and that among agents of the Intelligence Service jumped 40 percent.
					
					 That among officials of other ministries, offices and the "National Assembly", prosecution, etc. showed more than a 10 percent growth respectively.
					
					 The "Grand National Party" set a record in this respect. 
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the tendency of exemption from military service is carried forward by high-ranking officials generation after generation. 
					
					 10.3 percent of the sons and grandsons of the lawmakers of the 18th "National Assembly" were exempted from military service.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the "president," "prime minister" and the representative of the ruling party were all exempted from military service.
					
					 The power is in the hands of those who know neither war nor military affairs after evading the military service, causing the danger of war to increase as today.
					
					 This situation is touching off only hatred and discontent among various circles in south Korea. They complain that "only people without power and backing serve in the army."

articles.title: US Pro-war Attitude Condemned by S. Korean Party
articles.content:
US Pro-war Attitude Condemned by S. Korean Party
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea lashed out at the U.S. attitude to ignite a war against the DPRK. He made public a commentary on March 3.
					 The commentary said that the U.S. mulls designating Sherman, commander of the U.S. Army, as "commander" of the south Korea-U.S. "combined forces" and concurrently commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					
					 This is just aimed to bring dark clouds of a war to hang over the Korean Peninsula at any cost because he earned an ill fame as a typical war maniac in the Iraqi war of aggression, it pointed out.
					
					 It condemned the U.S. for pretending to be interested in dialogue. But in fact it is making substantial preparations for an anti-DPRK war behind the scene, it added.
					
					 The party will fight it out against the U.S. with all the people standing for peace on the peninsula, said the commentary.

articles.title: Struggle of MBC Pressmen in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle of MBC Pressmen in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Pressmen of MBC in south Korea have protested against the groundless suppression by its management fawning on the "government". 
					 On March 2, the MBC management took an unreasonable reshuffle of those makers of PD who conduct news coverage for disclosing the injustice of the present authorities' anti-popular rule. 
					
					 Enraged at this step, those pressmen contended that lurking behind it is an intention to remove anyone critical of the power. 
					
					 They warned that they would form an emergency measure committee and go on a campaign of disobedience in group.

articles.title: Struggle for Peace Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Peace Called for in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea called on the people to turn out in actions for peace against the war drills. 
					 In an appeal issued on March 3 it said that the Korean Peninsula is exposed to the danger of a war due to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and the south Korean warlike forces.
					
					 These drills are the biggest ones in terms of equipment and troops involved. They also surpass the U.S.-led RIMPAC joint military maneuvers aimed at invading the DPRK, the appeal condemned.
					
					 It said that a war in the Korean Peninsula will lead to national extinction, calling on all the south Koreans to actively turn out in the struggle for peace against dangerous war maneuvers.
					
					 The people from all strata should unite to judge the present war regime, said the appeal.

articles.title: Joint Action for Women's Rights Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint Action for Women's Rights Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Joint Planning Team for March 8 World Women's Day of south Korea called on the south Korean women to pool their efforts to win their rights. It declared this at a press conference in Seoul on March 3.
					 Speakers at the conference said that the women's living conditions have worsened in south Korea due to the Lee Myung Bak regime's anti-women and anti-labor policy.
					
					 The organization will stage a women's joint action with March 8 as an occasion to bring the miserable situation of the women home to the south Koreans and let them win equal rights, they said.
					
					 It made public a letter of protest denouncing the puppet authorities' unpopular policy of discriminating women.

articles.title: Japan's Despicable Discrimination against Korean Schools under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Despicable Discrimination against Korean Schools under Fire
Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Japan is despicably working to exclude the Korean schools from the tuition-waiver program for senior high schools. 
					 The Japanese authorities suspended the procedures for applying the program to the Korean schools in Japan at the end of last year under the pretext of Yonphyong Island shelling. They are still not retracting such unwarranted measure.
					
					 The issue of the above-said program is one of the election commitments made by the Democratic Party of Japan in 2009. The Koreans schools in Japan should be included in the program in light of the bill worked out by the government and the purpose of the program. A high-ranking official of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology once said that students of foreign schools are included in the program.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese reactionaries excluded only the Korean schools from the program which took effect from April 1 last year, claiming that "they are not pure educational establishments but schools putting main emphasis on the ideology to support the system in the north and organs for operations against Japan." This is a despicable measure.
					
					 The Korean schools in Japan are the institutions where the descendants of the Koreans who were forcibly drafted by the Japanese imperialists in the past study and legitimate national education organs operating with the approval of the Japanese government. Had the Japanese imperialists not invaded Korea and enforced a harsh colonial rule over it, the children of the Koreans in Japan would have not been born in the alien country and subject to such miserable fate as being exposed to discrimination in education.
					
					 The Japanese government is suppressing even the schools and students of the Koreans in Japan under the pretext of military tensions on the Korean Peninsula, while persistently imposing unreasonable sanctions against the DPRK. This is absolutely intolerable even in the light of historical and moral obligation Japan assumed before the Korean people.
					
					 The government's mean behavior is stirring up the atmosphere of discriminating against and rejecting Koreans in the Japanese society.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should stop at once the discrimination against the Korean schools in Japan, a part of their moves against the DPRK and the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan.

articles.title: US-S. Korean Joint Military Drills Censured
articles.content:
US-S. Korean Joint Military Drills Censured
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Sakhalin, Russia in a statement on March 3 berated the madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises. 
					 The statement strongly denounced the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities for staging the military drills with hundreds of thousands of troops, a U.S. nuclear-powered aircraft carrier and other war equipment involved.
					
					 The exercises are a blatant challenge to the DPRK which proposed resuming dialogue and negotiations, the statement said, stressing: They are also dangerous war maneuvers to escalate confrontation between the north and the south and plunge the Korean Peninsula into a nuclear war at any cost. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea hold the DPRK-targeted war maneuvers regularly to stifle the DPRK by force and render the situation of the peninsula tense, but the entire Korean nation is desirous of the inter-Korean reconciliation and unity, the statement added.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces to stop at once the military drills aimed at provoking a nuclear war and come out for dialogue and negotiations for peace and reunification in the peninsula.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Slashed
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Slashed
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Reckless joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean puppet warlike forces came under fire by Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan.
					 He in a statement on March 4 bitterly denounced the military drills in the name of all Korean youth and students in Japan, terming them a grave challenge to the desire of all the Koreans for reunification and a crime harassing peace on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Warlike forces, being keen on the saber-rattling with huge forces involved, are clamoring that "the door is open for dialogue", while talking about "collapse" in someone's "contingency". This is an imprudent behavior, the statement said.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. and south Korean authorities halt at once the reckless war exercises and no longer turn aside from the desire of all the Koreans for reunification.
					
					 Officials and members of the youth league would fulfill their role as vanguard in achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula and bringing earlier the national reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, it stressed.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Military Exercises Flailed
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Military Exercises Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People issued a statement on March 1 slashing at the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises. 
					 The statement said that the situation of the Korean Peninsula has been put on a very dangerous phase by the exercises, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle. 
					
					 Obstacles standing in the way of Korea's reunification are attributable to the forces aggravating the situation of the peninsula systematically, it said, adding:
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities replied with war moves to the proposal of the DPRK for having wide-ranging dialogue between the north and the south. 
					
					 It is just the U.S. and the south Korean authorities that stand against the reunification of Korea. 
					
					 We demand that they halt at once the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises against the DPRK. 
					
					 If they finally take to the road of war of aggression against the DPRK, they will surely face a stern punishment by the world people.

articles.title: DPRK Praised by Mexican Paper
articles.content:
DPRK Praised by Mexican Paper
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The Mexican newspaper Unidad Nacional carried an article titled "Strength of DPRK" on Feb. 28. 
					 The article said that the DPRK is not a big country, but it has great strength to which the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" dare not challenge.
					
					 The military power of the DPRK has grown stronger as it has Kim Jong Il as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, it said, adding:
					
					 He defined the Songun politics as the basic political mode of socialism and has developed the KPA into invincible revolutionary armed forces through his ceaseless inspection of its units. 
					
					 No other army can match the KPA in aspects of ideology and faith, and it is an unchallenged strong army ready both for defence and attack. 
					
					 The DPRK is very strong in military power but it has the strength more powerful than it.
					
					 In its society the leader, the party and the people are united as one community by the same destiny. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il is the center of single-minded unity of the whole society and its ideological foundation is the Juche idea, the Songun idea. 
					
					 The Juche idea, the Songun idea, created by President Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by Kim Jong Il is the only guiding idea of the DPRK.
					
					 The leader and the people are closely united in not only thinking and purpose but also moral obligation. This is the single-minded unity of the DPRK.

articles.title: CNPC on Defense Spending
articles.content:
CNPC on Defense Spending
 Beijing, March 5 (KCNA) -- Li Zhaoxing, a spokesman for the 4th Session of the 11th Chinese National People's Congress, referred to the issue of defense spending at a news briefing on March 4.
					 "The government has always tried to limit military spending and it has set the defense spending at a reasonable level to ensure the balance between national defense and economic development," said Li. 
					
					 The limited military strength of China is solely for safeguarding its national sovereignty and territorial integrity and would not pose a threat to any country," said Li.
					
					 He said China's defense expenditure is transparent and defensive.
					
					 "There is no such thing as the so-called hidden military expenditure in China," he said.

articles.title: China's Daily on US-Japan-S. Korea Military Exercises
articles.content:
China's Daily on US-Japan-S. Korea Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- People's Daily, a newspaper of China, on March 3 carried an article titled "The U.S., Japan and south Korea tear balloon of detente by 'military demos' on the same day".
					 Noting that the situation of the Korean Peninsula has been rendered tense again by the U.S.-south Korea Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises and the U.S.-Japan joint military drills started on Feb. 28, the article elaborated on the fact that those military maneuvers are aimed to round off war preparations for aggression on the DPRK and hold a military hegemony in Northeast Asia.
					
					 It is not by chance that the U.S. troops launched the military drills on the same day, it said, adding:
					
					 The U.S. troops have never relaxed their pace for consolidating the military presence in East Asia even a moment.
					
					 News analysts claim that the U.S. seeks, through the two exercises, to show other countries not only the action in concert of the U.S.-Japan-south Korea alliance but also ability of conducting large-scale wars simultaneously, to say nothing of knocking into shape the alliance and the military demonstration.
					
					 These military maneuvers are as good as tearing a balloon of detente with a dagger.
					
					 The boom of military exercises made the Korean Peninsula a focus of the world again.
					
					 The temporary stillness has already gone and the confused phase, in which change is unpredictable, is further dimming the future of Northeast Asia.

articles.title: World's Largest Rocket Production Base Takes Shape in North China
articles.content:
World's Largest Rocket Production Base Takes Shape in North China
 Beijing, March 5 (KCNA) -- The world's largest design, production and testing base for rockets is being built in north China's Tianjin Municipality, Liang Xiaohong, deputy head of the China Academy of Launch Vehicle Technology, told Xinhua Thursday.
					 The first phase of the rocket industrial base in Tianjin's Binhai New Area will be completed within the year. Rocket parts will be designed, manufactured, assembled and tested at the base, Liang said.
					
					 The base is designed to meet China's growing demand in space technology research and development for the next 30 to 50 years, he added.

articles.title: Russia Strives to Strengthen Strategic Rocket Forces
articles.content:
Russia Strives to Strengthen Strategic Rocket Forces
Moscow, March 5 (KCNA) -- The first missile regiment equipped with mobile inter-continental ballistic missile system PC-24 was put on a combat duty in Russia on March 4.
					 It is reportedly to strengthen the combat power of the task force of the Strategic Rocket Forces and nuclear deterrent of the strategic nuclear forces of Russia to cope with the missile defense system.
					
					 This was clarified by a spokesman for the Strategic Rocket Forces of Russia.

articles.title: Kyrgyzstan to Join Common Economic Space: PM
articles.content:
Kyrgyzstan to Join Common Economic Space: PM
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Kyrgyzstan will join Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan in their Customs Union and Common Economic Space, Prime Minister Almazbek Atambayev said Thursday.
					 "It would be hard for our republic to live without a common economic space," Atambayev said during a handover ceremony of Russian equipment to Kyrgyzstan.  Atambayev said, "Besides, we have to develop relations not only with Russia but with neighboring countries."
					
					 Russia, Belarus and Kazakhstan founded the Common Economic Space last year to expand mutual trade and investment.

articles.title: Number of Suicide Increases in Japan
articles.content:
Number of Suicide Increases in Japan
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- The number of suicide is on increase in Japan, causing public furor.
					 The number of people who committed suicide in 2010 due to their inability to land a job jumped 19.8 percent from the previous year, the National Police Agency of Japan said Thursday.

articles.title: Anecdotes about Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Anecdotes about Kim Il Sung 
 Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- A plane carrying a smelter of the then Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Works flew to the capital city of Pyongyang on December 31, Juche 46 (1957).
					 President Kim Il Sung, learning that the list of the participants in a state banquet did not include a representative of works, had taken a measure to send a plane to the works and take the smelter to Pyongyang.
					
					 Next day, the New Year, the President entered the banquet hall looking over the participants and stopped before the smelter.
					
					 The President asked him about the operation of the smelting furnace and inquired after health of other smelters and his family members.
					
					 He then introduced him to other participants, praising him as a hero who played a big role in the production of 270,000 tons of pig iron and offered a toast to him.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente    Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional.
					Cuando el Dirigente aparecio en el palco, todos los espectadores dieron calida bienvenida a el quien conduce a la senda de victorias a todo el partido, el ejercito y el pueblo.
					
					Disfrutaron tambien la funcion los cuadros del partido y el Estado, Kim Jong Un, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Hong Sok Hyong, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk y los funcionarios de las ramas de literatura y arte, prensa e informacion.
					
					Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena los programas de diferentes generos como la suite sinfonica "!Corea, te hare grande!", las musicas orquestales "Mi pais donde se realizan los ideales del pueblo" y "Arirang", la musica extranjera, etc.
					
					A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico las imborrables proezas del Dirigente, quien abre en la tierra patria la nueva era de prosperidad orientando al frente la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera con su ferrea conviccion y voluntad e inagotables esfuerzos.
					
					Y reflejaron bien la inconmovible conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos de llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo con fidelidad la guia del partido.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente les felicito por la exitosa funcion respondiendo a la aclamacion de los artistas y espectadores.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento a los creadores y artistas de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional por haber ofrecido el espectaculo con nuevas piezas.
					
					Dado que la musica es un humanismo, hay que describir con hermosa y rica interpretacion artistica el noble mundo espiritual de los hombres para satisfacer la demanda cultural del pueblo coreano, senalo.
					
					Acto seguido, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para desarrollar mas la autoctona sinfonia.
					
					Manifesto la esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas de la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional seran creadores verdaderos y defensores firmes de la literatura y arte socialistas y estimularan con la dinamica musica sinfonica la marcha revolucionaria del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que se levantaron unanimemente en la lucha por mejorar las condiciones de vida del pueblo y construir una gran potencia prospera.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio este lunes un mensaje de felicitacion al Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria con motivo del 48o aniversario de la Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en este pais.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 48o aniversario de la Revolucion del 8 de Marzo en Siria, hago llegar mi calurosa felicitacion a usted, al Partido Socialista del Resurgimiento Arabe, al gobierno y el pueblo de su pais amistoso.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para reafirmar el firme apoyo y solidaridad de nuestro pueblo con la lucha del pueblo sirio por recuperar las tierras arabes ocupadas como las alturas de Golan y solucionar imparcial y comprensivamente el problema del Medio Oriente.
					
					Tambien le deseo de todo corazon a usted buena salud y felicidad y nuevos exitos en el trabajo para la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Presidente de ACR propone contacto urgente a su homologo surcoreano
articles.content:
Presidente de ACR propone contacto urgente a su homologo surcoreano
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia 7 un aviso a su homologo surcoreano proponiendo el contacto urgente de trabajo de cruz roja Norte-Sur con respecto al problema de devolucion de los habitantes norcoreanos retenidos y su barco. 
					El texto expresa mucha lastima por el hecho de que las autoridades surcoreanas intentan hacer quedarse a 4 de 31 habitantes norcoreanos retenidos bajo el inventado "sometimiento", pese a la reiterada demanda de nuestra parte sobre la devolucion total. 
					
					La actitud inhumanitaria y arbitraria de la parte Sur provoca gran indignacion de la poblacion norcoreana, senala y agrega que la opinion publica interna y externa observa el presente caso preocupandose de sus efectos negativos en las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					4 personas, que expusieron la "voluntad de someterse" al decir de las autoridades surcoreanas, no tienen ninguna razon de hacerlo tanto en su situacion sociopolitica como en las circunstancias familiares y son avaladas absolutamente por sus familiares, parientes y colegas, afirma el aviso.
					
					  Propone sostener urgentemente el contacto de trabajo de cruz roja Norte-Sur a las 10 de la manana del dia 9 en la sala de reuniones de la ex Comision de Supervision de Naciones Neutrales en Phanmunjom para verificar el "sometimiento" y resolver cuanto antes el problema de devolucion de todos los habitantes retenidos.
					
					  Especifica que un miembro del CC de la ACR de la RPDC y otros 2 funcionarios correspondientes acudiran al contacto junto con los familiares de 4 personas en cuestion para la entrevista directa.
					
					De acuerdo con ello, los funcionarios de cruz roja de la parte Sur deben asistir en compania de 4 habitantes nuestros, exige fuertemente el aviso.

articles.title: RPDC envia aviso de protesta a la parte de tropas norteamericanas
articles.content:
RPDC envia aviso de protesta a la parte de tropas norteamericanas 
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- Al cabo de sus obstinadas maniobras para "someter" a los pescadores norcoreanos, que a principios de febrero pasado fueron arrastrados a la parte surcoreana por el viento y marea, la banda de traidores surcoreanos pretende retener ahora a algunos de ellos.
					El ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y hasta los surcoreanos protestan y condenan ese asqueroso acto de la banda de traidores que retuvo largo tiempo a los inocentes pescadores desgraciados luego de romper el dialogo N-S, abierto dificilmente, librando por otra parte los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					Sin embargo, la parte de tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea mando a nuestra parte un aviso que defiende ese crimen antihumanitario de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas inventando el intrigante "resultado de investigacion especial de la comandancia de las fuerzas de la ONU", carente de justificacion y fundamento cientifico.
					
					Frente a la conducta baja de la parte de tropas norteamericanas que en lugar de sentirse responsable por la division y las tensiones de la Peninsula Coreana, se hace complice en la campana de traidores surcoreanos para separar a los compatriotas, el jefe de la delegacion de la RPDC a las conversaciones militares a nivel de primer coronel RPDC-EE.UU. envio la vispera a aquella el siguiente aviso de protesta:
					
					La posicion de la parte de tropas norteamericanas deviene el acto inhumanitario y criminal que defiende a las autoridades surcoreanas que inventaron el "sometimiento" con enganos de todo tipo reteniendo casi un mes a nuestros habitantes arrastrados al territorio surcoreano por la tempestad.
					
					EE.UU., que suele decir que respeta los DDHH, coordina los pasos con las autoridades surcoreanas inventando el cartel de "grupo de investigacion especial". Esto es el crimen anti-etico mas grande que aumentara el rencor de nuestra nacion, que sufre los dolores de division nacional, al generar mediante el complot nuevas familias separadas.
					
					Si Estados Unidos aprecia de veras el humanitarismo y desea el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, tiene que actuar debidamente para exigir a las autoridades surcoreanas que devuelvan inmediatamente a todos nuestros habitantes retenidos.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos seguiran de cerca los movimientos posteriores de la parte de tropas norteamericanas.

articles.title: ATCC comenta ejercicios belicos de EE.UU., Japon y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ATCC comenta ejercicios belicos de EE.UU., Japon y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- Amenazan seriamente la estabilidad y la paz de la sociedad internacional las detonaciones que se escuchan en el Nordeste Asiatico. 
					Coincidiendo con los ejercicios militares conjuntos Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle", tuvo lugar en la base de Yokosuka de Japon un simulacro conjunto EE.UU.-Japon para la interceptacion de misiles balisticos. 
					
					Estos entrenamientos parten del imprudente guion de guerra de EE.UU. que pretende perfeccionar la alianza militar tripartita con Japon y el Sur de Corea y consolidar su posicion de amo de la region al demostrar la capacidad de realizar simultaneamente las guerras de gran envergadura. 
					
					El Nordeste Asiatico es una region muy complicada donde estan enmaranados los intereses de paises regionales. 
					
					EE.UU. desplazo de Europa a Asia-Pacifico el foco de su atencion y se autoproclama como "Estado del Pacifico" con el fin de recrudecer la intervencion politica, economica y militar en esta region. 
					
					Para ese fin, el imperio mantiene la estructura de guerra fria en el Nordeste Asiatico y aumenta sus fuerzas armadas de acuerdo con la nueva estrategia regional. Y al mismo tiempo, realiza a menudo las acciones militares para asegurar la supremacia militar en la region. 
					
					Lo que llama la atencion es que los ejercicios militares en la region se enfocan en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Algunos medios de prensa de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea alegan que los ejercicios militares conjuntos como "Key Resolve" son entrenamientos anuales. Pero, en los ejercicios belicos de este ano se incorporan las unidades de tropas especiales y el portaaviones y el tema de ellos se definio abiertamente como "controlar y eliminar rapidamente las armas de exterminio masivo de Corea".
					
					Los ejercicios en cuestion tienen la meta de fortalecer la alianza militar tripartita EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea y resultan el chequeo de la OTAN asiatica para comprobar la disposicion de combate. 
					
					Formando un bloque de cooperacion belica, esos tres paises incurren en acciones militares contra el Nordeste Asiatico y el resto de paises asiaticos. 
					
					Frenar la guerra y preservar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana son la clave de la paz del Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con control teniendo presente que sus imprudentes acciones militares en la Peninsula Coreana tendran imprevisibles consecuencias para la seguridad regional.

articles.title: Se amplian destinos turisticos en Pyongyang
articles.content:
Se amplian destinos turisticos en Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- Se diversifica el turismo en Pyongyang a medida que se construyen en los ultimos anos muchas creaciones monumentales.
					El subtitular de la Direccion Nacional de Turismo, Jo Song Gol (57 anos de edad) hizo a la ATCC las siguientes declaraciones:
					
					Pyongyang es conocida desde la antiguedad como uno de 8 paisajes famosos de Corea.
					
					Los destinos de turismo en la capital se dividen a grandes rasgos en dos clases, o sea, los lugares famosos y ruinas historicas incluyendo 8 paisajes de Pyongyang y los establecimientos construidos  despues de la segunda mitad de los 50 del siglo pasado.
					
					Han sido levantados en los ultimos anos muchos edificios importantes de  interes economico-cultural, tales como la biblioteca electronica y el centro de piscinas de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Conservatorio Kim Won Gyun de Pyongyang, el Parque Juventud de Kaeson, la Granja de Avestruces y la Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang. 
					
					Estas creaciones despiertan la curiosidad de los turistas extranjeros.
					
					Se enriquece la cultura culinaria gracias al servicio de platos famosos en el Restaurante Okryu de fama mundial y otros.
					
					Se construyen nuevas instalaciones turisticas en los montes Ryong-ak, Taesong y la colina Moran y otros lugares pintorescos.
					
					El turismo artistico-cultural incluye el disfrute de las renovadas funciones de la Orquesta Unhasu, la Banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae, el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre y otras bandas prestigiosas.

articles.title: Actos de discriminacion de escuelas coreanas en Japon
articles.content:
Actos de discriminacion de escuelas coreanas en Japon
						
Pyongyang, 7 de marzo (ATCC) -- Japon actua vilmente para excluir a toda costa las escuelas coreanas de la lista de escuelas superiores subsidiadas.
					A finales del ano pasado, pretextando el incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong del Mar Oeste de Corea, las autoridades japonesas suspendieron la tramitacion para aplicar el subsidio a las escuelas coreanas y no cancelan hasta el momento esta medida injusta.
					
					El apoyo a escuelas superiores es una promesa electoral presentada en 2009 por el Partido Democratico de Japon.
					
					Si se toma en cuenta el proyecto de ley elaborado por el gobierno japones para cumplir esa promesa y el objetivo del sistema de apoyo, las escuelas coreanas en Japon merecen ser subsidiadas por el gobierno de este pais.
					
					Hasta un funcionario de alto rango del Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia habia afirmado que los "extranjeros matriculados en escuelas extranjeras se incluyen tambien en la lista de subsidiados".
					
					Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses no aplicaron solo a las escuelas coreanas el sistema de subsidio, que entro en vigencia desde el primero de abril del ano pasado, alegando que "no son instituciones puramente docentes sino organos de trabajo sobre Japon centrados en la educacion ideologica para apoyar el regimen del Norte de Corea".
					
					Las escuelas coreanas en Japon, donde estudian los descendientes de los coreanos arrestados forzadamente en el siglo pasado por el imperialismo japones, son instituciones legales de educacion nacional que funcionan bajo la aprobacion del gobierno japones.
					
					Si no hubiera la agresion a Corea del imperialismo japones y su brutal dominacion colonial, no habria el caso de ellos que nacieron en la tierra foranea y sufren la desgracia de aprender siendo discriminados.
					
					Tal medida discriminatoria de las autoridades japonesas resulta mas imperdonable si se recuerda la responsabilidad historica y moral de Japon por sus crimenes cometidos en contra del pueblo coreano.
					
					Como resultado del comportamiento sucio del gobierno japones, la ola xenofoba contra los coreanos se expande en toda la sociedad japonesa.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben poner punto final a sus actos de discriminacion sobre escuelas coreanas que forman parte de su campana anti-RPDC y anti-Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon).
